experienceEntries.name: High School
experienceEntries.description: I obtained my CESS in general education at Collège Saint-Stanislas, where I pursued a track in advanced sciences with English immersion. My curriculum also included Latin and English immersion, which allowed me to develop strong language and analytical skills.

experienceEntries.name: University
experienceEntries.description: I began a Bachelor\'s degree in Computer Science at the UCLouvain polytechnic school, where I studied for two years. Although I successfully passed most of my courses, I did not pass the ones related to mathematics and electricity.

experienceEntries.name: University college
experienceEntries.description: I earned a Bachelor\'s degree in Computer Science, specializing in application development , at HELHa in Mons. This program allowed me to gain deep technical skills and develop my expertise in programming and project management.

experienceEntries.name: Internship
experienceEntries.description: I completed a 3-month internship at ETNIC in the R&D department as a fullstack developer, where I participated in the development of a RAG . This internship enabled me to apply my theoretical knowledge in a professional context while working as part of a team on a concrete project.

experienceEntries.name: Atelier Créactifs - FastAI
experienceEntries.description: Training in the use of the FASTAI library to create and configure an artificial intelligences
